# Bookish Octo Fiesta
Picks 8 books from the Goodreads authors you follow and adds it to your shelf. 

![alt text](https://openclipart.org/image/2400px/svg_to_png/204593/octo1.png "Octo fiesting")

### Setup:

1. Click on [![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/848061ad5ed4b1dc3a1d#?env%5Bbookish-octo-fiesta%) button. 

2. To generate your OAuth Access Tokens, run this docker image using the command below. 
```
docker run -it aliasgarmurtaza/bookish-octa-fiesta
```

3. Open the url in the browser to authorize Goodreads access. 

4. Add the generated `OAuth Token` and `OAuth Secret` in the collection's environment.

5. Run the collection and enjoy your personalized reading list! :)

6. (optional) Set up a weekly Postman monitor to get a curated list every week!
